Login Pages: site:{site} inurl:wp- OR inurl:plugin OR inurl:upload OR inurl:download
Backdoors: site:{site} inurl:shell OR inurl:backdoor OR inurl:wso OR inurl:cmd OR shadow OR passwd OR boot.ini OR inurl:backdoor
Install/Setup files: site:{site} inurl:readme OR inurl:license OR inurl:install OR inurl:setup OR inurl:config
Wordpress Plugins/Uploads/Downloads: site:{site} inurl:wp- OR inurl:plugin OR inurl:upload OR inurl:download
Open Redirects: site:{site} inurl:redir OR inurl:url OR inurl:redirect OR inurl:return OR inurl:src=http OR inurl:r=http
Files: site:{site} ext:cgi OR ext:php OR ext:asp OR ext:aspx OR ext:jsp OR ext:jspx OR ext:swf OR ext:fla OR ext:xml
Documents: site:{site} ext:doc OR ext:docx OR ext:csv OR ext:pdf OR ext:txt OR ext:log OR ext:bak
Apache Struts RCE: site:{site} ext:action OR ext:struts OR ext:do
File Passwords: site:{site} intext:'connectionString' AND inurl:'web' AND ext:'config'
